channel.title: spacex on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in spacex on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-01
item.description: Elon Musk tells SpaceX employees that Starship engine crisis is creating a ‘risk of bankruptcy’ (3 minute read) SpaceX could face bankruptcy if it cannot achieve a Starship flight rate of at least once every two weeks next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-09
item.description: Google is planning a new Silicon Valley campus with hardware hub, plans show (4 minute read) Google is planning to build another Silicon Valley campus, dubbed ‘Midpoint’, with a center partly devoted to hardware.
